text: Uncle B is the debut studio album by English hip hop group N-Dubz. The album is dedicated to N-Dubz's first manager and father of Dappy, Byron Contostavlos. He died shortly before the band were signed to their second record label All Around the World. The album was released 17 November 2008. This is even though the group started recording it in 2006. The delay was because to the group changing record label from LRC to All Around the World.Last FM N-Dubz information retrieved 2015-10-11. ==Tracklist== ==Charts== Chart Peak position Certification(s) Irish Albums ChartIRMA Irish Albums Chart "Uncle B" retrieved 2015-10-11. 36 UK Albums ChartOfficial Charts Company UK Albums Chart "Uncle B" (ChartStats) retrieved 2015-10-11. 11 PlatinumBPI certified awards search.
